official-title.#text:
To amend the Indian Child Protection and Family Violence Prevention Act to require background
			 checks before foster care placements are ordered in tribal court
			 proceedings, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Native American Children’s Safety Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:

text.#text:
Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this subsection, each Indian tribe shall
			 establish procedures to recertify homes or institutions in which foster
			 care placements are made.
